analysis.purpose: To alert about Donald Trump's presence in Palm Beach

analysis.summary: An email from Jeffrey Epstein's account sent to himself alerting about Donald Trump's presence in Palm Beach on February 16, 2018, suggesting potential surveillance or location tracking of the former president.
